text: Aur inn mein baaz aisay hain kay aap ki taraf kaan lagatay hain aur hum ney inn kay dilon per parda daal rakha hai iss say kay woh iss ko samjhen aur inn kay kanon mein daat dey rakhi hai aur agar woh log tamam dalaeel ko dekh len to bhi inn per kabhi eman na layen yahan tak kay jab yeh log aap kay pass aatay hain to aap say khuwa ma-khuwa jhagartay hain yeh log jo kafir hain yun kehtay hain kay yeh to kuch bhi nahi sirf bey sanad baaten hain jo pehlon say chali aarahi hain
